title: Sales Staff
description:
Kalau kamu memiliki kualifikasi dibawah ini :

  1. Kamu, minimal lulusan SMA/SMK
  2. Kamu punya pengalaman bekerja minimal 2 tahun akan lebih kita prioritaskan
  3. Pastinya kamu harus memiliki etika yang baik
  4. Kamu mahir berkomunikasi baik secara lisan maupun tulisan
  5. Tidak gaptek dalam penggunaan media sosial dan komputer
  6. Kamu bisa bekerja secara individual ataupun dalam tim

Segera join bersama kita ya. Karena kamu akan dapetin ini semua:

  1. Kalau kamu rajin & disiplin, akan dapat tunjangan kerajinan dan kedisiplinan
  2. Tunjangan komunikasi buat kamu isi pulsa atau kuota setiap bulannya
  3. Kamu udah gak perlu lagi bingung cari makan siang karena kita siapin kamu makan siang
  4. Komisi tiap bulan yang akan kamu dapetin
  5. Budaya kerja yang sangat kekeluargaan
  6. Banyak aktivitas kantor yang dapat kamu ikutin, seperti tiap minggu akan ada olahraga bareng
  7. Akan jadi karyawan tetap kalau kamu lulus dari masa percobaan

Waktu kerjanya :
Senin (07.45 - 16.45 WIB), Selasa - Jumat (08.30 - 17.30 WIB)

title: Sistem informasi rumah sakit: staff implementasi dan support
description:
Responsibilities:

• Meeting with clients following the sale of software packages to collect data and other information required to customize software systems.

• Creating a project plan for each client, detailing the tasks that need to be completed for the timely installation of customized software systems.

• Communicating with clients throughout the software customization process to obtain feedback and approval.

• Customizing software systems based on clients’ individual needs and specifications.

• Educating clients via training on how to use purchased software systems and customized system features.

• Creating a specialized document for each client as required, detailing all customizations made.

• Installing customized software systems and all necessary components.

• Ensuring that the project team is aware of key deliverables and project milestones.

• Providing cost and time estimates to clients who require additional customizations to be done.

• Providing 2nd level support after system successfully implemented.

Implementation Specialist Requirements:

• Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, computer information science, information technology, or a related field.

• Proven experience working as an system implementation and support specialist

• Sound technical knowledge.

• Proficiency in all Microsoft Office and Google Workspace applications.

• The ability to multitask effectively.

• The ability to work independently and as part of a team.

• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

• Excellent organizational and time management skills.

• Exceptional communication and customer service skills.

• Detail-oriented.
